item.title: [sld] Hawkins National Laboratory // The Upside Down
item.description: Legendary Land // Legendary Land

item.title: [sld] Mulldrifter
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.title: [sld] Mulldrifter
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.title: [sld] Craterhoof Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Haste

When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

item.title: [sld] Craterhoof Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Haste

When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

item.title: [sld] Metalwork Colossus
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of noncreature artifacts you control.

Sacrifice two artifacts: Return Metalwork Colossus from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sld] Metalwork Colossus
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of noncreature artifacts you control.

Sacrifice two artifacts: Return Metalwork Colossus from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [q06] Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Sorcery

If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

item.title: [q06] Chandra, Torch of Defiance
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Chandra

+1: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 2 damage to each opponent.

+1: Add {R}{R}.

−3: Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature.

−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."

item.title: [q06] Ethereal Armor
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

item.title: [q06] Silkwrap
item.description:
Enchantment

When Silkwrap enters the battlefield, exile target creature with mana value 3 or less an opponent controls until Silkwrap leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

item.title: [q06] Isolate
item.description:
Instant

Exile target permanent with mana value 1.

item.title: [q06] Searing Blood
item.description:
Instant

Searing Blood deals 2 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, Searing Blood deals 3 damage to the creature's controller.

item.title: [q06] Hidden Strings
item.description:
Sorcery

You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [q06] Wild Slash
item.description:
Instant

Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, damage can't be prevented this turn.

Wild Slash deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [q06] Lurrus of the Dream-Den
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Nightmare

Companion — Each permanent card in your starting deck has mana value 2 or less. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.)

Lifelink

During each of your turns, you may cast one permanent spell with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard.

item.title: [q06] Spell Queller
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flash

Flying

When Spell Queller enters the battlefield, exile target spell with mana value 4 or less.

When Spell Queller leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [pres] Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Cleric

Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

{3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [pres] Scute Swarm
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. If you control six or more lands, create a token that's a copy of Scute Swarm instead.

item.title: [pres] Kogla, the Titan Ape
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ape

When Kogla, the Titan Ape enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

Whenever Kogla attacks, destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls.

{1}{G}: Return target Human you control to its owner's hand. Kogla gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [pres] Nyx Lotus
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

Nyx Lotus enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Choose a color. Add an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color. (Your devotion to a color is the number of mana symbols of that color in the mana costs of permanents you control.)

item.title: [sld] Ilharg, the Raze-Boar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Boar God

Trample

Whenever Ilharg, the Raze-Boar attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Return that creature to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

When Ilharg, the Raze-Boar dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

item.title: [sld] Protean Hulk
item.description:
Creature — Beast

When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Fleet Swallower
item.description:
Creature — Fish

Whenever Fleet Swallower attacks, target player mills half their library, rounded up.

item.title: [sld] Goblin Trashmaster
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Warrior

Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.

Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [sld] Gishath, Sun's Avatar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dinosaur Avatar

Vigilance, trample, haste

Whenever Gishath, Sun's Avatar deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put any number of Dinosaur creature cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [sld] Demonlord Belzenlok
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Demon

Flying, trample

When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

item.title: [sld] Griselbrand
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, lifelink

Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

item.title: [sld] Liliana's Contract
item.description:
Enchantment

When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.

item.title: [sld] Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying

Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [sld] Razaketh, the Foulblooded
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Alchemist's Refuge
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{G}{U}, {T}: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

item.title: [sld] Gavony Township
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

item.title: [sld] Desolate Lighthouse
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

item.title: [sld] Kessig Wolf Run
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{X}{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Grim Backwoods
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Moorland Haunt
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{W}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [sld] Nephalia Drownyard
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}{U}{B}, {T}: Target player mills three cards.

item.title: [sld] Stensia Bloodhall
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}{B}{R}, {T}: Stensia Bloodhall deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [sld] Slayers' Stronghold
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Vault of the Archangel
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}{W}{B}, {T}: Creatures you control gain deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Great Furnace
item.description:
Artifact Land

{T}: Add {R}.

item.title: [sld] Ancient Den
item.description:
Artifact Land

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [sld] Seat of the Synod
item.description:
Artifact Land

(Seat of the Synod isn't a spell.)

{T}: Add {U}.

item.title: [sld] Vault of Whispers
item.description:
Artifact Land

(Vault of Whispers isn't a spell.)

{T}: Add {B}.

item.title: [sld] Tree of Tales
item.description:
Artifact Land

(Tree of Tales isn't a spell.)

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [sld] Mind Flayer, the Shadow
item.description:
Legendary Enchantment Creature — Horror

Mind Flayer, the Shadow isn't a creature unless you control three or more permanents you don't own.

At the beginning of your end step, exile the bottom card of each opponent's library face down. For as long as those cards remain exiled, you may look at them, you may cast permanent spells from among them, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

item.title: [sld] Lucas, the Sharpshooter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Lucas, the Sharpshooter deals 1 damage to target creature. Goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [sld] Max, the Daredevil
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

Haste

Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, untap target creature, then investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [sld] Will the Wise
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

When Will the Wise enters or leaves the battlefield, each opponent may investigate. Each opponent who doesn't loses 1 life. You investigate X times, where X is one plus the number of opponents who investigated this way.

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)
